prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and intricate patterns.
I want a bird-like Pokemon with unique markings and a mysterious aura.
Generate a Pokemon resembling ancient hieroglyphics, colorful and dynamic.
Make a creature that has a whimsical design, inspired by ancient civilizations.
Imagine a winged Pokemon that blends bright colors with geometric shapes.
Design a Pokemon that showcases both elegance and enigma through its features.
Show me a legendary bird Pokemon with a striking color palette and unique powers.

distinctive_features: Two large wings with colorful tips
A round, black head with a single eye
Multiple appendages resembling arms or hands
